error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page or contact us if the problem persists.
error.contactPrompt: If the problem persists, please contact us:

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Looks like you've wandered off the beaten path! This page doesn't exist, but Prague has plenty of amazing places to explore.
notFound.bookingPrompt: Join Filip for an unforgettable storytelling experience through Prague's historic streets.
notFound.helpText: If you were looking for something specific, try using our search or browse our tours above.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.description: No internet connection detected. You can still browse cached tour information, but booking requires an internet connection.

bookingContact.title: Ready to Book? Contact Filip Directly:

bookingTemplate.title: When contacting, please include:
bookingTemplate.group: Number of people in your group

offline.helpText: This page will automatically refresh when your internet connection is restored.

paymentError.title: Payment Issue
paymentError.description: There was a problem processing your payment. Please check your payment details and try again.
paymentError.suggestion1: Verify your card details are correct
paymentError.suggestion2: Check if your card has sufficient funds

availabilityError.title: Tour Unavailable
availabilityError.description: This tour is no longer available for your selected date and time.

genericError.title: Booking Error
genericError.description: We encountered an issue while processing your booking. Please try again or contact us for assistance.
genericError.suggestion1: Refresh the page and try again
genericError.suggestion3: Contact us directly to complete your booking

bookingError.reassurance: Don't worry - your tour spot isn't lost! We're here to help you complete your booking.
bookingError.responseTime: We typically respond within 2 hours during business hours.
